short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the Kenyan president's name with user-selected nicknames like '#RutoMustGo' and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ruto Filter extension is a powerful tool of digital protest against President William Ruto, embodying the collective frustration of many Kenyans who believe #RutoMustGo and support #ImpeachBoth. This extension allows users to replace the president's name with nicknames that represent our discontent. 

By installing the Ruto Filter, you're joining a movement that peacefully expresses dissent and highlights the call for change. Itâ€™s a simple but effective way to amplify our voices, showing solidarity in the pursuit of accountability and better governance.
